text:
1. To Initiate a Dial :
------------------------
Parameter  : PhoneNo - Phone number to be dialed
URL        : http://ServerIp:Port/CallFunctions.xbc?DialoutThisNumber()&PhoneNo=V ALUE
Example    : http://192.168.11.99/CallFunctions.xbc?DialoutThisNumber()&PhoneNo=9876543210
Returned XML : 
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1" ?>
<Call> 
<CampId>1</CampId> 
<RecId>1</RecId> 
<Status>1</Status> 
<Msg>Number added successfully.</Msg> 
</Call>
Status :
1 - SUCCESS
0 - FAILED
2. To Check Status:
--------------------
Parameters : campid - Unique Id of the Process  |  Recid - Unique Id of the Record
URL        : http://ServerIp:Port/CallFunctions.xbc?CheckStatus()&campid=VALUE&recid=VALUE
Example    : http://192.168.11.99/CallFunctions.xbc?CheckStatus()&campid=1&recid=1
Returned XML : 
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1" ?>
<Call>
<CampId>1</CampId> 
<RecId>1</RecId> 
<Status>2</Status> 
<Msg>Success</Msg> 
</Call>
Status:
 2 - SUCCESS
 1 - IN PROGRESS
 0 – PENDING
-1 – FAILED
-2 - INACTIVE (Lead Inactive)
-3 - INACTIVE (Present in DND)3.To Dispose the Call:
 ----------------------
Parameters : campid - Unique Id of the Process  |  recid - Unique Id of the Record
URL        : http://ServerIp:Port/CallFunctions.xbc?DisposeTheCall()&campid=V ALUE&recid=V ALUE
Example    : http://192.168.11.99/CallFunctions.xbc?DisposeTheCall()&campid=1&recid=1
Returned XML :
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1" ?> 
<Call>
<Status>1</Status> 
<Msg>The call disposition done successfully.
</Msg> 
</Call>
Status :
1 - SUCCESS 
0 - FAILED
